attributes.contentHtml:
Pamar

  1. Paying through that role meant Exposure, a small thing that you couldn't give to me. Also, don't you remember when you called my logo trash, and then one of your staff DMed me with the request of getting permission to use it on your host? Did you already forget that?
  2. TripHost or what name did that host have. You've DMed me, that you have some friends that own a host and need help with a logo. The owner was your alt. After I've made it, and after you've received it, blocked me. And let's not forget that we were friends at that time. Now tell me, why should I or anyone trust you?

mituishere Pamar


some photos with a trash logo I've made...
...

Did you already forgot, didn't you?
